Title: Relates to concealment and/or mutilation of a human corpse
Summary: Relates to concealment and/or mutilation of a human corpse by any person; exempts practice of funeral direction and organ donation.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to concealment and/or mutilation of a human corpse; and to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to authorizing bail for principals charged with concealment and/or mutilation of a human corpse
